thread.title: New Sacramento Kings player Buddy Hield welcomed by fans at Sacramento International Airport
thread.title_full: New Sacramento Kings player Buddy Hield welcomed by fans at Sacramento International Airport

title: New Sacramento Kings player Buddy Hield welcomed by fans at Sacramento International Airport

organizations.name: sacramento international airport new sacramento kings
sacramento kings more videos new sacramento kings

text: New Sacramento Kings player Buddy Hield welcomed by fans at Sacramento International Airport Feb 21, 2017 "I know they traded a big piece of their team for me so I know that I have to give Sacramento my all," said Buddy Hield after landing in Sacramento Tuesday, February 21, 2017. Hector Amezcua The Sacramento Kings More Videos New Sacramento Kings player Buddy Hield welcomed by fans at Sacramento International Airport 0:59 Omri Casspi: 'I just didn't believe it was going to happen' 1:43 DeMarcus Cousins: 'I'm in a good place. I learn from my mistakes.' 1:39 DeMarcus Cousins' goodbye: 'I still got love for the city, I still got love for the fans' 3:04 DeMarcus Cousins talks to media before finding out he'd been traded to New Orleans 2:08 Darren Collison confident about Kings' chances after the All-Star break 1:48 Kings' 'grit' helps preserve win over Lakers 3:14 Kings overcome rough fourth quarter for fourth straight win 0:52 Sacramento Kings Ben McLemore on getting more comfortable on the floor after victory vs Pelicans 0:42 "To be a playoff team we need to get out of the gates a little bit stronger," Sacramento Kings forward Matt Barnes after victory vs New Orleans Pelicans 2:29 Coach Joeger talks player progress before tip-off against Pelicans 1:27 Dave Joeger on getting Kings to comeback from behind for another victory vs Hawks 1:20 Sacramento Kings guard Darren Collison on Kings bench leading them to victory vs Hawks More Videos
